title: Cheesy Potato Soup
ingredients: ['475g peeled and cubed potatoes', '60g chopped celery', '80g chopped onion', '1 chicken stock cube', '250ml water', '1 teaspoon dried parsley', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 pinch ground black pepper', '2 teaspoons plain flour', '350ml milk', '150g grated Cheddar cheese', '125g chopped ham']
